title: Exposing the Democrat’s Plan to Destroy Us (Ep 1400)
description:
In this episode, I discuss the Democrat’s destructive plan to crush the conservative movement long-term, and the battle plan to fight back. 

News Picks:

No, President Trump did not concede the election.


What the heck is going on in Pennsylvania? 

What’s going on in Georgia?

Tucker Carlson discussed how the Democrats rigged the 2020 election. 


Icon of identity politics paid more than a black woman for the same job. 


Latino support for President Trump surged in 2020.
